sentences.en: Second, we will strategize on how to apply the emerging understanding so that a rapid scaling up may be possible.
sentences.cn: 其次，我们将会为关于如何利用这新兴的协议从而使快速的扩大成为可能制定战略。

sentences.en: Sometimes, it's more interesting to play games where you have time to think and strategize or where the goal is to cooperate with each other to win the game.
sentences.cn: 有时候，玩有时间思考和制定战略或者目标是与他人合作取得胜利的游戏更加吸引人。

sentences.en: Strategize and work all the angles to see how the story turns out.
sentences.cn: 制定战略并在各方面付诸行动,看看故事怎么发展.

sentences.en: This information should be used to strategize about the approach to take in subsequent interviews.
sentences.cn: 这些信息应该用来为后续访谈中将采用的方法制定策略.

sentences.en: VISUALIZE , STRATEGIZE , ENERGIZE, REALIZE reprogramming is the subject today.
sentences.cn: 可想而知, 策划和推动我们,今天的主题是重新认识.

sentences.en: Which: Identify your obstacles and strategize to overcome them.
sentences.cn: 确定您的障碍所在，并制定战略来克服这些障碍。

trans.tran_cn: 制订战略[行动计划]，为…制订战略[行动计划]
